name: Jazz Night
description:
Welcome to the jazzy future of puzzle platforming.
Control two characters and clear levels.
Easy enough right?
80% tutorial, 20% pain. 100% reason to vote this up on https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/quantum-box-3

Control Mr White With WASD
Control Miss Black with the arrow keys
If you get stuck, press R to reset your current stage.

Done as a weekend Game Jam. Finnish Game Jam to be exact. As a part of the Global Game Jam.
